thread.title: A minute for childlike honesty
thread.title_full: A minute for childlike honesty | News24

author: news24.com
title: A minute for childlike honesty
text:
Dear Earthlings.
I wish to declare October 14th, 12:00 PM as an opportunity to spend a minute of honest reflection upon unsaid things. Spend a minute to reflect on how you wish to say something honest in a polite manner as to welcome truth into our world.
If you wish, please comment politely on things that you deem wrongful in our world.
Mark 14 October 12:00 pm as a minute of honesty in your calendar!
All the Best.
Seneca
